about_the_game:
How to prove you have a soul?

Liber, a mindless doll spending his days as an automated servant, finds himself acquiring a conscience and with that, the urgency to escape this doomed Manor.

Meet eccentric angels, renegade demons and scientists with divine ambitions; friends or foes, there’s one common desire: to claim their souls and flee Nowhere Manor before it vanishes in a few days.

ACROSS THE HALLS AND CHAMBERS OF THIS MANOR…


  • A dark adventure rendered in Monaramis's unique dreamlike art style, in 4K resolution.
  • The manor holds memories and secrets, use them to navigate a society who will not hesitate to sacrifice whoever gets in the way of their goals.
  • Unravel the guests, you must a build a soul to escape; your alliances — and hostilities — will dictate your success.
  • Multiple endings: your choices will influence the story and fate of the other characters.
  • Bargain with angels and demons, escape perdition and conquer your existence!
detailed_description:
How to prove you have a soul?

Liber, a mindless doll spending his days as an automated servant, finds himself acquiring a conscience and with that, the urgency to escape this doomed Manor.

Meet eccentric angels, renegade demons and scientists with divine ambitions; friends or foes, there’s one common desire: to claim their souls and flee Nowhere Manor before it vanishes in a few days.

ACROSS THE HALLS AND CHAMBERS OF THIS MANOR…


  • A dark adventure rendered in Monaramis's unique dreamlike art style, in 4K resolution.
  • The manor holds memories and secrets, use them to navigate a society who will not hesitate to sacrifice whoever gets in the way of their goals.
  • Unravel the guests, you must a build a soul to escape; your alliances — and hostilities — will dictate your success.
  • Multiple endings: your choices will influence the story and fate of the other characters.
  • Bargain with angels and demons, escape perdition and conquer your existence!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or SteamOS
  • Processor: Quad-core 2GHz or faster 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia, AMD or Intel Graphics with support for Vulkan 1.2
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12 Monterey
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

name: Nowhere Manor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core 2GHz or faster 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 11 compatible
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: House of stolen devil bargains and indolent angelic aristocracy: Nowhere Manor is doomed to disappear. You can leave if you’ve got a soul … but that’s not an option for an artificially created servant such as Liber. Just how far are you willing to go escape?
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian
